entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:42 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:55 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -9.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: W 7 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 09:11 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 09:11 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
